website_summaries.verdict: Fast and easy to use, this lock offers a unique design that may work better for some users than a traditional steering wheel lock.
pros: Top-only design may be more effective for some users than shaft-and-hook locks
Solidified steel is durable and tough to cut through
Rugged locking cylinder with crescent key design
cons: Because of its design, this option will not protect against airbag theft

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Made super cheaply and is not long enough to provide any protection against theft. Will simply rotate with the steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Slides around.  Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Slides around two of my cars’ steering wheels. A thief could easily just drive around with it on and not have to remove from the steering wheel. Won’t fit 1990 F150 or 1982 300D.
customer_reviews.author: Patrici Murici

customer_reviews.title: Practical and low-cost
customer_reviews.text: This really does fit all steering wheels, and is easy to lock and unlock. It would probably not be difficult for a car thief skilled in physical break-ins to remove, but I am using it on a keyless car that relies on electronic security as well. It's a bit on the cheaply-made side, but the bright yellow color should be enough to tell crooks with electronic hacking devices that they should try another car.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: NEXT...
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE!!!! Claims to fit securely, it doesn’t. Just look at the other reviews. I had never seen a lock like this before so I was very intrigued. When I got it I noticed it seemed very poorly made. The plastic is easily breakable. This seems more as a visual deterrent than an actual working product. DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: 4-star instead of 5-star because locking handle slips as steering well turns. There is an easy fix.
customer_reviews.text: The locking handle will slid down the steering wheel making it questionable for stopping unauthorized use of the vehicle. Fix is to get about $1 worth of 1"x1" felt furniture "slides" (used on the bottom of furniture to prevent floor scratching). Use the built in tape on the slides to glue 2-3 in the upper part of the handle mechanism and 2 on the lower latching part. Now when closed it is a tight fit that will not budge.
customer_reviews.author: AEG

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy..
customer_reviews.text: I gave this many stars because I was disappointed before I bought this I read other reviews about item but when I got it it really looked poorly made the hard plastic where the key goes and is molded in to is cheap any one can can break that the way they have cordless power tools now this is a goner..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: keep your car safe
customer_reviews.text: fit my GMC 2011 truck just fine clean and strong turn wheel all the way to one side place the lock on the wheel good to go. with the covid there has been a up tick in auto thefts. cost of the steering wheel lock as to the cost of replacement of the car is well worth it
customer_reviews.author: dtodj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect theft deterrent for my Jeep
customer_reviews.text: It’s clearly visible on the dashboard of my Jeep so it should work as a deterrent. I like to drive topless on the hot summer weekends so this is perfect when I have to run into the store or coffee shop. Any extra theft deterrent is always good!
customer_reviews.author: dice6

customer_reviews.title: Easy locking bar for convertible
customer_reviews.text: This is an effective way to prevent thieves from driving off with my convertible when I have the top down. I also tow the car, backwards, on a tow dolly behind my motorhome and will also be purchasing a steering wheel to brake pedal lock for added safety.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Brown

customer_reviews.title: I feel secure now
customer_reviews.text: it is definitely noticeable from the outside and I have tinted windows is a lot more sleek then other hook or brake security methods and that what I like about this one I need to put it on all the time so It doesn't take up room when I put it on the side while I drive
customer_reviews.author: Vicente

customer_reviews.title: Poorly thought out
customer_reviews.text: Fits weirdly and pretty much useless anyone who really wants to steal your car still could
customer_reviews.author: Trish W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but, doesn't fit a 2002 Land Rover Discovery very well
customer_reviews.text: While it works on the bottom of the wheel, it won't work on the top due to the dash. Also note it leaves marks on the wheel of my 2002 Land Rover. I gave it away and ordered a different style lock.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin E

customer_reviews.title: Good so far. Wrangler JL 2019
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We will see how it goes when the weather clears up, and my 2019 Wrangler Unlimited Sahara top stays off. It won’t work if you have a wheel cover. Small enough to store under the passenger side seat.
customer_reviews.author: TNBC12

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Pot metal it was gift. Like the style needs be little stronger made to me but very great ideas right thier slows down car theives at least car theft major problems in California
customer_reviews.author: Steven nunes

customer_reviews.title: Works well👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to say for sure, but when some cars on my street ware broken into, mine wasn't between them.
customer_reviews.author: True Caller

customer_reviews.title: cant remove from steering wheel
customer_reviews.text: bad could not unlock and pull key and finally got it unlocked. tried again off steering and cant unlock and remove the key. I was out of town on business so lucky I tested before trying the lock again onnthe steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Very thin metal
customer_reviews.text: The metal on this product is very thin and it isnt tight. So it slides. I was hoping for something sturdier. The concept is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Keith

customer_reviews.title: Works but kinda flimsy - Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Flimsier than I expected but works great on my 2007 civic.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal H.

customer_reviews.title: Great products and sleek design.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product!! I bought it for my brother and a good friend. I feel safer, every time I lock up my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: dyogo2

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lock and unlock
customer_reviews.text: Nice. locks and unlocks easy not to long use on a Jeep Wangler
customer_reviews.author: George Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: Good Product Overall, left a little Mark on my Dashboard whilst I try to turn the steering wheel with it on (Testing It's Effectiveness). It's also very hard to install with a steering wheel cover on.
customer_reviews.author: Damion Bundah

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock.
customer_reviews.text: It fits on my steering wheel perfectly and doesn't touch any buttons. Works great. Make sure you measure the diameter of your steering wheel before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t make the latch Device out of metal Not plastic would make you feel more secure with locking your car
customer_reviews.author: caveman

customer_reviews.title: great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: it is nice to buy something that surpasses your expectation. great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Perez

customer_reviews.title: I will never purchase again!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that’s not worth the buy, I sent it back as all the features are falsely advertised
customer_reviews.author: Nene

customer_reviews.title: Save ur money
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a good buy for a steering lock till my honda got stolen
customer_reviews.author: Warren c.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect in my car, I hope nobody steal my var with it
customer_reviews.author: Jose Candido de Sousa Filho

customer_reviews.title: Key will not come out at all
customer_reviews.text: They like it very much but they only is that the key got stuck to it and it will not come out from it lock now I can’t use it but the first I received it I had no problem using it til the key will now not come out
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Did not even come close to working on my 2019 CRV. Poor quality too. Felt very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Not a goo product
customer_reviews.text: I fit good and snug on my steering wheel, but it will not prevent a thief from driving off with my car, and it caused cosmetic damage to my steering wheel which I am pissed about. I feel like an idiot for buying it. I have got to start being more careful. I wound up buying a Club at an auto parts store.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: NOT Universal
customer_reviews.text: Product is NOT universal as described. It will not fit at the top of the steering wheel on 2019 Honda HRV! I have to lock it on the side of my steering wheel. Furthermore, only 2 keys are provided, not 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome i thought i got my key stolen so I added this for extra protection and it did the job great!
customer_reviews.author: Coyo Hernandez

product_meta.title: Zone Tech Car Steering Wheel Lock - Premium Quality Strong Durable Heavy Duty Anti-Theft Steering Wheel Lock
feature_bullets: ► SECURE LOCK - The Zone Tech steering wheel lock is equipped with accurate computer coding cresent cylinder heavy duty locking mechanism to ensure security. Stops keyless entry robbery.
► DURABLE - The Zone Tech steering wheel lock has solid and firm body for strength and weatherability. Solidified steel for unrivaled cut resistance. Impossible to sawed through.
► PREMIUM QUALITY - The Zone Tech steering wheel lock is made with premium quality heavy duty materials to ensure maximum strength and durability for long lasting usage.
► EASY TO USE - The Zone steering wheel lock is easy to use. It can be installed within 5-seconds. Can be installed to the back of the steering wheel so its not laying over the airbag.
► UNIVERSAL FIT - The Zone Tech steering wheel lock is designed to be able to accommodate any steering wheel, even with airbag.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars108 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
